ScalarVariable.name: bus.angleDisplay
ScalarVariable.description: Angle in degrees for display purposes

ScalarVariable.name: Gen1.PMECH0
ScalarVariable.description: Initial value of machine electrical power (machine base)

ScalarVariable.name: Gen1.vr0
ScalarVariable.description: Real component of initial terminal voltage

ScalarVariable.name: Gen1.vi0
ScalarVariable.description: Imaginary component of initial terminal voltage

ScalarVariable.name: Gen1.ir0
ScalarVariable.description: Real component of initial armature current (system base)

ScalarVariable.name: Gen1.ii0
ScalarVariable.description: Imaginary component of initial armature current (system base)

ScalarVariable.name: Gen1.PSIppq0
ScalarVariable.description: q-axis component of the sub-transient flux linkage

ScalarVariable.name: Gen1.PSIppd0
ScalarVariable.description: d-axis component of the sub-transient flux linkage

ScalarVariable.name: constantLoad.S_p.re
ScalarVariable.description: Real part of complex power (active power)

ScalarVariable.name: constantLoad.S_p.im
ScalarVariable.description: Imaginary part of complex power (reactive power)

ScalarVariable.name: constantLoad.S_i.re
ScalarVariable.description: Real part of complex power (active power)

ScalarVariable.name: constantLoad.S_i.im
ScalarVariable.description: Imaginary part of complex power (reactive power)

ScalarVariable.name: constantLoad.S_y.re
ScalarVariable.description: Real part of complex power (active power)

ScalarVariable.name: constantLoad.S_y.im
ScalarVariable.description: Imaginary part of complex power (reactive power)

ScalarVariable.name: constantLoad.PF
ScalarVariable.description: Ration between active and reactive power; Not Power Factor
